description:
After being replaced by a new rival pair, the Moe-Kath Trio are down in the dumps. Then, Kathleena decides that Suchat is the real reason behind their continued failures! Will rigorous training with Chigiru lead Suchat to a new gimmick that will make him a star?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さらば, 愛しのモエカス!
